downloadTitle: Search Environment Planning for Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010
downloadDescription: This model describes primary architecture design decisions for search environments.

downloadFile.name: Search Model 2 of 4 - Search Environment Planning.pdf
Search Model 2 of 4 - Search Environment Planning.vsd
Search Model 2 of 4 - Search Environment Planning.xps

detailsSection: This enterprise search model steps you through design decisions based on where users and content are located and presents four different designs for geographically dispersed deployments.
detailsSection_file_name: Search Model 2 of 4 - Search Environment Planning.pdf
Search Model 2 of 4 - Search Environment Planning.vsd
Search Model 2 of 4 - Search Environment Planning.xps
systemRequirementsSection:
To edit the Visio version of the model, you must have Microsoft Office Visio 2007. You can also use Microsoft Internet Explorer and the Visio 2007 Viewer to view the model.
To view the PDF version of the model, you must have a PDF viewer, such as Adobe Reader
To view the XPS version of the model, you must have Windows Vista, Windows XP with .NET Framework 3.0, or XPS Essentials Pack.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
